h2.strong: READ BELOW A SUMMARY OF OUR DISTRICT VALUES

div.p: TRUSTWORTHINESS: Be honest. Donâ€™t deceive, cheat or steal. Be reliable-do what you say youâ€™ll do. Be alcohol, tobacco and drug free. Have the courage to do the right thing. Build a good reputation. Be loyalâ€“stand by your family, friends, country and school.

p.br:
RESPECT: Treat yourself and others with respect; follow the golden rule. Be tolerant of differences. Use good manners, not bad language. Be considerate of the feelings of others. Donâ€™t threaten, hit or hurt anyone. Deal peacefully with anger, insults and disagreements.
FAIRNESS: Play by the rules. Take turns and share. Be open-minded; listen to others. Donâ€™t take advantage of others. Donâ€™t blame others carelessly.

div.p:
RESPONSIBILITY: Do what you are supposed to do. Persevere: keep on trying. Always do your best. Use physical and verbal self-control; be self-disciplined. Think before you actâ€“consider the consequences. Be accountable for your choices.
CARING: Be kind. Be compassionate and show you care for yourself and others. Express gratitude. Forgive others and yourself. Help people in need.
CITIZENSHIP: Do your share to make your school and community better. Cooperate. Stay informedâ€“vote. Be a good neighbor. Obey laws and rules. Respect authority. Protect the environment.
